Title: An Act to Change the Name of Jolo Elementary School Unit I in Barangay Barangka Drive, Municipality of Mandaluyong, Metro Manila, to Bonifacio Javier Elementary School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 709
An Act to Change the Name of Jolo Elementary School Unit I in Barangay Barangka Drive, Municipality of Mandaluyong, Metro Manila, to Bonifacio Javier Elementary School
Section 1. The Jolo Elementary School Unit I located at Barangay Barangka Drive, Municipality of Mandaluyong, Metro Manila, is hereby renamed Bonifacio Javier Elementary School in honor of the late Bonifacio Javier, Mayor of Mandaluyong from 1961 to 1965.
Section  2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 13, 1984
